publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.incipit: ቃለ᎓ በረከት᎓ ዘሄኖክ᎓ ዘከመ᎓ ባረከ᎓ ኅሩያነ᎓ ወጻድቃነ᎓ እለ᎓ ሀለዉ᎓ ይኩኑ᎓ በዕለተ᎓ ምንዳቤ᎓ ለአሰስሎ᎓ ኲሎ᎓ እኩያነ᎓ ወረሲዓነ፨
msItem.explicit: ወየሐውሩ᎓ እሙንቱሂ᎓ በኀበ᎓ ተጽሕፈ᎓ ሎሙ᎓ መዋዕል᎓ ወአዝማን፨ ተፈጸመ᎓ ዘሄኖክ᎓ ስብሐት᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ አምላክነ᎓ ኦሪት᎓ ይትሉ፨

msItem.incipit: ወሀሎ᎓ አሐዱ᎓ ብእሲ᎓ በብሔረ᎓ አውሲጢድ᎓ ዘስሙ᎓ ኢዮብ᎓ ወውእቱ᎓ ብእሲ᎓ ራትዕ᎓ ወንጹሕ᎓ ወጻድቅ᎓ ወፈራሄ᎓ እግዚአብሔር፨
msItem.explicit: ወእለሂ᎓ መጽኡ᎓ ኀቤሁ᎓ አዕርከቲሁ᎓ ኤልፋዝ᎓ ዘእምደቂቀ᎓ ኤሳው᎓ ንጉሠ᎓ ቴማን᎓ ወበልዳዶስ᎓ መስፍነ᎓ አውኪዮን᎓ ወሳፍር᎓ ንጉሠ᎓ አሜናዊ፨ ተፈጸመ᎓ ኢዮብ᎓ በዝየ᎓ አስተምሀሩ᎓ ለዘአጽሐፎ᎓ ወለዘጸሐፎ᎓ እለ᎓ ኣንበብክምዎ᎓ ወለዘሰምዖ᎓ ትዕግሥት᎓ ዘለዓለም᎓ አሜን፨ ስረዩ᎓ ወባረኩኒ፨

msItem.title: ነገሥት᎓
msItem.incipit: ወሀሎ᎓ ፩ብእሲ᎓ ዘእምነ᎓ አርማቴም፨ጸፊም᎓ እ እመነ᎓ ደብረ᎓ ኤፍሬም᎓ ወስሙ᎓ ሕልቃና᎓ ወልደ᎓ ኢያርሜያል᎓ ወልደ᎓ ኤሊ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ቶቄብናሴብ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ጸፍ᎓ ኤፍራታዊ፨ ወቦ᎓ ካልኤ᎓ አንስት᎓ ወስማ᎓ ለአሐቲ᎓ ሐና᎓
msItem.explicit: ወዳዊትኒ᎓ አተወ᎓ እምኀበ᎓ ቀተሎሙ᎓ ለአማሌቅ᎓ ወነበረ᎓ ዳዊት᎓ ውስተ᎓ ሴቄላቅ᎓ ሰኑየ᎓ መዋዕለ፨ ፨ ፨
msItem.note: 1 Kings = Ethiopic 1 Samuel.

msItem.incipit: ወአመ᎓ ሣልስት᎓ ዕለት᎓ መጽአ᎓ ብእሲ᎓ እምነ᎓ ትዕይንት᎓ እምውስተ᎓ ሕዝቡ᎓ ለሳኦል᎓ ወስጡጥ᎓ አልባሲሁ᎓ ወሐመድ᎓ ውስተ᎓ ርእሱ፨ ወሶበ᎓ ቦአ
msItem.explicit: ወነደቀ᎓ ዳዊት᎓ በህየ᎓ ምሥዋዓ᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ ወአዕረገ᎓ መሥዋዕተ᎓ ሰላም። ወተሣሃለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ለምድር᎓ ወኃደጎሙ᎓ ሞት᎓ ለእስራኤል፨ ፨ ፨ ፨ ወበልዓ᎓ እሳተ᎓ ሰማይ᎓ ወኢገብረ᎓ መሥዋዕተ᎓ በደብተራ᎓ እስመ᎓ ፈርሆ᎓ ለመልአክ፨ ፨ ፨ ፨
msItem.note: 2 Kings = Ethiopic 2 Samuel (the work is called 2 Kings in the colophon).

msItem.incipit: ወዳዊትሰ᎓ ንጉሥ᎓ ልህቀ᎓ ወኀለፈ᎓ መዋዕሊሁ᎓ ወይከድንዎ᎓ በአልባስ᎓ ወይያመውቆ᎓
msItem.explicit: ወአምዕዖ᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ አምላከ᎓ እስራኤል᎓ ከመ᎓ ኵሎሙ᎓ እለ᎓ ገብሩ᎓ አበዊሁ᎓ እምቅድሜሁ፨ ወዓለውዎ᎓ ሞአብ᎓ ለእስራኤል᎓ እምድኅረ᎓ ሞተ᎓ አከዐብ፨ ፨ ፨ ፨
msItem.note: 3 Kings = Ethiopic 1 Kings. There is a lacuna in fol. 61vc, and the text begins on fol. 62ra (1 Kings 8:52), in a new quire, with two rubricated lines. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 2 to 22) are added in the margins. Numerous corrections and glosses (some in Amharic), omitted passages added in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ወእምድኅረ᎓ ሞተ᎓ አክኣብ᎓ አፅረሩ᎓ ሞአብ᎓ ወደወየ᎓ አካዝያስ᎓ ወሰከበ᎓ ውስተ᎓ ሰማርያ᎓ ወለአከ᎓ ሐዋርያተ᎓ ወይቤሎሙ᎓ ሖሩ᎓ ተለአኩ᎓ ሊተ᎓
msItem.explicit: ወይመስሕ᎓ ምስሌሁ᎓ ዘልፈ᎓ ወፍቶ᎓ ኵሎ᎓ አሚረ᎓ ይነሥእ᎓ እምነ᎓ ቤተ᎓ ንጉሥ᎓ ወይሁብዎ᎓ እንተ᎓ ጸብሐት᎓ በኵሉ᎓ መዋዕለ᎓ ሕይወቱ፨
msItem.note: 4 Kings = Ethiopic 2 Kings (called 4 Kings in the colophon). Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 25) are added in the margins. Numerous corrections and glosses (some in Amharic), omitted passages added in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.title: Ethiopic explanation of several Hebrew names
msItem.incipit: ኤሎሄ፡ ብሂል፡ አምላከ፡ ኣዶናይ፡ ብሂል፡ እግዚእ። ጸባኦት፡ ብ፡ ዘኃይላት ዚአየ᎓ ብ᎓ መልዕልተ᎓ ታቦት፨
msItem.explicit: ናኮር᎓ ብ᎓ ተርእየት᎓ እንተ᎓ ትመጽእ፨

incipit.hi: ቀዳሜ᎓ ኵሉ᎓ ሳኦል᎓ ነግሠ᎓ ለእስራኤል᎓ አርብዓ᎓ ዓመተ᎓ እምነገደ᎓ ብንያም᎓

msItem.explicit: ፋቁሔ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ሮሜልዩ᎓ ፳፨ ሆሴዕ᎓ ወልደ᎓ አላ᎓ ፱፨
msItem.note: A big lacuna on fol. 84v.

msItem.title: ሕፁፃን፡
msItem.note: Books of the Chronicles.

msItem.incipit: አዳም፡ ሴት፡ ሔኖን፡ ቃይናን፡ መላልዔል፡ ኢያሮድ፡ ሄኖክ፡ ማቱሳላ፡ ላሜክ፡ ኖኅ፡ ወደቂቁ፡ ለኖኅ፡ ሴም፡ ወካም፡ ወኢያሬት᎓ ወደቂቁ፡ ለኢያፌት᎓ ጋሜር፡ ወማጉግ፡ ማዳይ።
msItem.explicit: በዕብሬተ᎓ ንጉሡ᎓ ለዳዊት᎓ ላዕለ᎓ ኵሉ᎓ ይስራኤል᎓ ይስራኤል᎓ ወላዕለ᎓ ኵሉ᎓ ነገሥተ᎓ ምድር፨
msItem.note: 1 Chronicles. Running title on fols. 85r-92r. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 29) are added in the margins. Only few corrections.

msItem.title: ሕፁፃነ፡ ነገሥተ፡ ይሁዳ᎓ ካልእ
msItem.incipit: ወጸንዓ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ወልደ፡ ዳዊት᎓ በመንግሥቱ፡ ወእግዚአብሔር᎓ አምላኩ᎓ ምስሌሁ።
msItem.explicit: ዘይከውን᎓ ይኩን᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ ምስሌሁ᎓ ወይሖር᎓ ወይሕንጽ፨
msItem.note:
2 Chronicles. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 47)
are added in the margins. Only few corrections. A half of fol. 111v is blank.
Proverbs.

msItem.title: ሰሎሞን᎓
msItem.incipit: ምሳልያተ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ወልደ፡ ዳዊት፡ ዘነግሠ፡ ለእስራኤል፨ ለአእምሮ᎓ ጥበብ᎓ ወተግሣጽ᎓ ለአእምሮ᎓ ቃለ᎓ ጥበብ᎓ ለተወክፎ᎓ ተመይጦ፡
msItem.explicit: ወእመ᎓ ዘንተ᎓ ትገብር᎓ ትመጽእ᎓ እንዘ᎓ ትሐውር᎓ ንዴትከ፨ ወተፅናስ᎓ ከመ᎓ ኄር᎓ ረዋፂ፨
msItem.note:
Proverbs of Solomon. The title is added in the middle of the upper margin, in a different hand. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 25) are added in the margins. Numerous corrections,
omitted passages are added in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.title: ሰሎሞን᎓
msItem.incipit: ወዝንቱ᎓ ምሳሌ᎓ ሰሎሞን᎓ ዘጸሐፉ᎓ሰብአ፡ ሕዝቅያስ᎓ ንጉሠ᎓ ይሁዳ፨ ክብረ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ የሀብእ᎓ ነገረ᎓ ወስብሐተ፡ ንጉሥ᎓ የሐትት፡ ነገረ፨
msItem.explicit: ሀብዋ᎓ እምፍሬ᎓ እደዊሃ፨ ወይትአኰት᎓ በአናቅጽ᎓ ግብራ፨
msItem.note: Admonition of Solomon. The title is added in the middle of the upper margin, in a different hand. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by number 25 to 29) are inserted in the margins. The final part (ጥበበ᎓ ባሕር᎓ ወልድ᎓...) that follows the words ምኑን᎓ ብእሲ᎓ ጻድቅ᎓ ለብእሲ᎓ ገፋዒ። ወርኩስ᎓ ለኃጥእ᎓ ፍኖት᎓ ርትዕት፨, fol. 120vb, begins as a text incipit, with three rubricated lines followed by black lines.

msItem.incipit: ቃለ፡ መክብብ፡ ወልደ፡ ዳዊት፡ ንጉሠ፡ እስራኤል፡ በኢየሩሳሌም። ከንቱ፡ ከንቱ፡ ኵሉ፡ ከንቱ፡ ይቤ፡ መክብብ፡ ከንቱ፡ ከንቱ፡ ምንት፡ ፈድፋዱ፡ ለሰብእ።
msItem.explicit: እመ᎓ ሠናይ᎓ ወእመ᎓ እኩይ፨
msItem.note: Ecclesiastes. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ, followed by numbers 1 to 12) are added in the margins. Only few corrections.

msItem.incipit: ጥበበ፡ ሰሎሞን፡ ንጉሥ። ክፍል᎓ ቀዳማይ፨ አፈቅርዋ፡ ለጽድቅ፡ እመኳንንተ᎓ ምድር። ወኃልዩ᎓ ኃይለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓
msItem.explicit: በኵሉ᎓ ጊዜ᎓ ወበኵሉ᎓ መካን᎓ እንተ᎓ ትሄሉ᎓ ህየ፨፨፨ ተፈጸመ᎓ በዝየ᎓ ጥበበ᎓ ሰሎሞን፨
msItem.note: Wisdom of Solomon. In addition to the division in parts with rubrication and word ክፍል followed by a number, chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ, followed by numbers 1 to 16) are added in the margins.

bibl.citedRange: Pars posterior, quea continet apparatum criticum.

msItem.incipit: ራእየ᎓ ዘርእየ᎓ ኢሳይያስ᎓ ወልደ᎓ አሞጽ᎓ ዘርእየ᎓ በእንተ᎓ ይሁዳ᎓ ወበእንተ᎓ ኢየ ሩሳሌም፨
msItem.explicit: ወይሬእዩ᎓ አብድንቲሆሙ᎓ ለእለ᎓ ዐለዉኒ᎓ ወዕፄሆሙ᎓ ዘይነውም᎓ ወእሳቶሙ᎓ ዘኢይጠፍእ᎓ ወይከውኑ᎓ አርአያ᎓ ለኵሉ᎓ ዘሥጋ፨
msItem.colophon: ተፈጸመ᎓ ዘኢሳይያስ᎓ ስብሐት᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ ቅዱስ᎓ ለዓለመ᎓ ዓለም፨
msItem.note: The rubricated title is inserted in a decorative frame, in the middle of the upper margin. Chapter indications (abbreviated as ምዕ and followed by numbers 1 to 66; number 67 is missing) continue throughout the text. Numerous glosses and commentaries in Gəˁəz (some in Amharic) are written in the margins.
The Cycle of Jeremiah.The rubricated title is placed between two red dotted lines.

msItem.incipit: ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘኮነ፡ ኀበ፡ ኤርምያስ፡ ወልደ፡ ኬልቅዩ፡ ዘእምካህናት፡ ዘይነብር፡ ውስተ፡ አናቶት፡ በብሔረ፡ ብንያም። ወኮነ፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ኀቤየ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ኢዮስያስ፡ ወልደ፡ አሞጽ፡ ንጉሠ፡ ይሁዳ፡ አመ፡ ዓሠርቱ᎓ ወሠለስቱ᎓ አመተ፡ መንግሥቱ። ወኮነ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ኢዮአቂም፡
msItem.explicit: እስከ᎓ ዕለተ᎓ ሞቱ᎓ በኵሉ᎓ መዋዕለ᎓ ሕይወቱ፨
msItem.note:
Book of Jeremiah. Chapter indications (abbreviated as ምዕ and followed by numbers 1 to 52) are written in the margins.
Corrections, glosses and commentaries (some in Amharic) are written in the margins.

msItem.incipit: ዝነገረ᎓ መጽሐፍ᎓ ዘጸሐፈ᎓ ባሮክ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ኔርዩ᎓
msItem.explicit: በፍሥሐ᎓ ወበብርሃነ᎓ ስብሐቲሁ᎓ ወበጽድቁ፨
msItem.note: Book of Baruch.

msItem.incipit: ሰቆቃወ᎓ ኤርምያስ᎓ ነቢይ᎓ ወእምዝ᎓ እምድኅረ᎓ ፄወውዎ᎓
msItem.explicit: እስመ᎓ ለእመ᎓ መንኖ᎓ መነንከነ᎓ ተምዓዕከ᎓ ላዕሌነ᎓ ጥቀ፨
msItem.note: Lamentation of Jeremiah. Chapter indications (abbreviated as ምዕ and followed by numbers 1 to 5) are written in the margins. Some corrections, glosses and commentaries (some in Amharic) are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: አርአያ᎓ መጽሐፍ᎓ ዘኤርምያስ᎓᎓ ዘፈነወ᎓ ኀበ᎓ እለ᎓ ፄወውዎ᎓
msItem.note: Epistle of Jeremiah. A couple of corrections are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ትንቢተ፡ ኤርምያስ᎓ ወይቤሎ᎓ ኤርምያስ᎓ ለፋክሶር᎓ ወአንትሙሰ
msItem.explicit: እስመ᎓ ከዐወ᎓ ደመ᎓ ንጹሕ᎓ ውስተ᎓ ኵነኔ፨
msItem.note: Prophecy of Jeremiah Told to Pashhur. One correction is inserted in the margin.

msItem.incipit: ተረፈ፡ ነገር፡ ዘባሮክ፡ ዘኢኮነ፡ ኅቡአ፡ ዘአመ᎓ ፄወዉ᎓ ባቢሎን06 ወኮነ᎓ ሶበ፡ ፄወውዎሙ፡ ለደቂቀ᎓ እስራኤል᎓ ንጉሠ᎓ ከላዴዎን᎓
msItem.explicit: ነዋ᎓ ጽሕፍት᎓ ውስተ᎓ መጽሐፈ᎓ ባሮክ፨
msItem.colophon: ተፈጸመ᎓ በዝየ᎓ መጽሐፈ᎓ ባሮክ᎓ ወትሩፋተ᎓ ነገሩ᎓ ለኤርምያስ፨
msItem.note: 4 Baruch (Paralipomena of Jeremiah). Lacuna on fols. 179rc-179v. A few corrections are inserted in the margins and interlineally.
Book of Ezekiel (version Eth I) followed by explanations of some Hebrew names and words.

msItem.incipit: ወኮነ᎓ አመ᎓ ሠላሳ᎓ ክረምት᎓ በራብዕ᎓ ወርኅ᎓ በኃምስ᎓ ሠርቅ᎓ ወሀሎኩ᎓ ማእከለ᎓ ፄዋ᎓ በፈለገ᎓ ኮባር፨
msItem.explicit: ወአውዱኒ᎓ ፼᎓ ወሰማንያ᎓ ፻᎓ ወስመ᎓ ሀገራ᎓ እምዮም፨ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ህየ፨
msItem.note:
Book of Ezekiel (version Eth I). The rubricated rubricated running titles are written in the upper margin of the recto-side of each folio (between two red dotted lines on fol. 180r). Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 48)
are written in the margins. A few corrections, glosses and commentaries (some in Amharic)
are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ትሄ᎓ ዘ᎓ መጋረጃ᎓ ኤላም᎓ ዘ᎓ ሕንጸት᎓ ዘመቅደስ᎓
msItem.explicit: ትሄ᎓ ዘ᎓ መንቃዕ፣
msItem.note: Explanations of some Hebrew names and words, separated from the previous text by two dotted lines. Large lacuna on fols. 199ra-v.

msItem.incipit: ወሀሎ᎓ አሐዱ᎓ ብእሲ᎓ ዘይነብር᎓ ባቢሎን᎓ ወስሙ᎓ ኢዮአቄም᎓ ወአውሰበ᎓ ብእሲት᎓ እንተ᎓ ስማ᎓ ስና᎓
msItem.explicit: ፈቀዱ᎓ ይቅትልዎ᎓ አውርድዎሙ᎓ ውስተ᎓ ግብ᎓ ወበልዕዎሙ᎓ ሶቤሃ᎓ በቅድሜሁ፤ ዘዳንኤል፨ ተፈጸመ᎓
msItem.note: Book of Daniel. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 48) are written in the margins. Corrections, glosses and commentaries (some in Amharic) are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ቃለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ ኀበ᎓ ሆሴአ᎓ ወለደ᎓ በዔርም᎓ በመዋዕለ᎓ ዖዝያን᎓ ወዮአታም᎓ ወአከዝ᎓ ወሕዝቅያስ᎓ ነገሥተ᎓ ይሁዳ᎓ ወበመዋዕለ᎓ ኢዮርብአም᎓ ወልደ᎓ ዮአስ᎓
msItem.explicit: ለእግዚአብሔር᎓ ጻድቃን᎓ የሐውርዎን᎓ ወኃጥአንስ᎓ ይነሥእንዎን᎓ ዘኵሎ᎓ ይመልክ፨
msItem.note: Book of Hosea. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 14) are written in the margins. A few corrections are inserted interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ዘአሞጽ᎓ ነቢይ᎓ ቃለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ ላዕለ᎓ አሞጽ᎓ ዘአቃሬም᎓ ዘቴቅሑ᎓ ዘርእየ᎓ በእንተ᎓ እስራኤል᎓ በመዋዕለ᎓ ዖዝያን᎓
msItem.explicit: እንተ᎓ ወሀብከዎሙ᎓ ይቤ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ አምላክ᎓ ዘኵሎ᎓ ይመልክ፨
msItem.note: Book of Amos. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 9) are written in the margins. A few corrections are inserted interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ቃለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ ኀበ᎓ ሚክያስ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ሞራት᎓ በከመዋእለ᎓ ኢዮአታም᎓ ወአካዝ᎓ ወሕዝቅያስ᎓ ነገሥተ᎓ ይሁዳ᎓
msItem.explicit: በከመ᎓ መሀለከ᎓ ለአባዊነ᎓ በመዋዕለ᎓ ታካት፨ በዘመነ᎓ ኢዮአታም᎓ ነበረ፨
msItem.note: Book of Micah. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 7) are written in the margins. A few corrections are inserted interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ዘኢዮኤል᎓ ነቢይ᎓ ቃለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ ኀበ᎓ ኢዮኤል᎓ ወልደ᎓ ባቱኤል᎓ስምዑ᎓ ዘንተ᎓ ሊቃውንት᎓ ወአጽምኡ᎓ ኵልክሙ᎓
msItem.explicit: እስመ᎓ አነ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ዘአኃድር᎓ ውስተ᎓ ጽዮን፨
msItem.note:
Book of Joel. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4
followed by numbers 1 to 3) are written in the margins. One correction on fol. 215rb is inserted interlineally.

msItem.incipit: በዘመነ᎓ ኢዮአታም᎓᎓ ዘርእየ᎓ አብድዮ᎓ ከመዝ᎓ ይቤ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ በእንተ᎓ ኢዶምያስ፠ ሰሚዐ᎓ ሰ᎓ማዕነ᎓ እምኀበ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ወፈነወ᎓ ሐዋርያ᎓ ላዕለ᎓ አሕዛብ
msItem.explicit: ከመ᎓ ይትበቀልዎ᎓ ለደበረ᎓ ዔሳው᎓ ወይከውን᎓ መንግሥት᎓ ለእግዚአብሔር፨
msItem.note: Book of Obadiah. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4 followed by numbers 1 to 3) are written in the margins.

msItem.incipit: በዘመነ᎓ ዖዝያን᎓᎓ ዘዮናስ፡ ነቢይ፡ ወኮነ፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ኀበ፡ ዮናስ፡ ነቢይ፡ ወልደ፡ አማቴ፡ ወይቤሎ፡ ትንሥእ፡ ወሑር፡ ነነዌ፡ ሀገር፡ ዓባይ፡ ወስብክ፡ ላቲ፡ እስመ፡ ዓርገ፡ እከዮሙ፡ ኀቤየ።
msItem.explicit: ኢፈለጡ᎓ ፀጋሞሙ᎓ ወየማኖሙ᎓ ወአንከስ᎓ ብዙኅ፨
msItem.note: Book of Jonas. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4 followed by numbers 1 to 4) are written in the margins.

msItem.incipit: በዘመነ᎓ ኢዮአክስ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ኢዮአየስ᎓᎓ ዘናሖም᎓ ነቢይ᎓ ተረፈ᎓ ነኔዌ᎓ መጽሐፈ᎓ ራእዩ᎓ ለናሖም᎓ ወልደ᎓ ሔልቅዩ᎓ እግዚአብሔር፡ ቀናኢ᎓ ወመስተበቅል፡ ወይትቤቀሎሙ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በመዓቱ᎓
msItem.explicit: ላዕሌኪ᎓ እስመ᎓ ላዕለ᎓ ኵሉ᎓ በጽሐት᎓ እኪትኪ᎓ በኵሉ᎓ ጊዜ፨
msItem.note: Book of Nahum. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4 followed by numbers 1 to 2) are written in the margins.

msItem.incipit: በመንግሥተ᎓ ሴደቅያ᎓ ተነበየ᎓ ዘዕንባቆም᎓ ነቢይ᎓ ተረፈ᎓ ዘርእየ᎓ ዕንባቆም᎓ ነቢይ᎓ በመንግሥተ᎓ ሴዴቅያስ᎓ ተነበየ᎓᎓ እስከ፡ ማእዜኑ፡ ንኬልሕ᎓ ወኢትሰምዕ፡ ነአውዩ፡ ኀቤከ᎓ ተገፊዐነ᎓
msItem.explicit: ወትፈርሆ᎓ ኵላ᎓ ምድር᎓ እምቅድመ᎓ ገጹ፨
msItem.note:
Book of Habbakuk. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4
followed by numbers 1 to 2) are written in the margins. A few corrections are inserted interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ᎓ ሰማዕኩ᎓ ድምፀከ᎓ ወፈራህኩ᎓ ርኢኩ፡ ግብረከ፡ ወደንገፅኩ።
msItem.explicit: ወያዓርገኒ᎓ ውስተ᎓ መልዕልት። ከመ᎓ እማዕ᎓ በመኃልዪሁ፨
msItem.note: Prayer of Habbakuk (noted as chapter 3).

msItem.incipit: ዘስፎንያስ፡ ነቢይ። ቃለ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ ኀበ᎓ ስፎንያስ፡ ወልደ᎓ ኵስ᎓ ወልደ᎓ስፎንያስ፡ ወልደ᎓ ሶዶልያ᎓ ወልደ᎓ አሜርያ᎓
msItem.explicit: አመ᎓ ሜጥኩ᎓ ፄዋክሙ᎓ በቅድሜክሙ᎓ ይቤ᎓ እግዚአብሔር፨
msItem.note: Book of Zephania. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4 followed by numbers 1 to 3) are added in the margins. A few corrections are written interlineally.

msItem.title: ትንቢት᎓᎓ ዘዘካርያስ፡ ነቢይ።
msItem.incipit: በካልእ፡ ዐመተ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ለዳርዮስ፡ በሳምን፡ ወርኅ፡ ኮነ፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ኀበ፡ ዘካርያስ፡ ወልደ፡ በራክዩ፡ ወልደ፡ ሐዶ፡ ነቢይ፡ ወይቤሎ፡ ተምዕዐ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ላዕለ፡ አበዊክሙ፡ ዓቢየ፡ መዓተ፡
msItem.explicit: ውስተ᎓ ቤተ᎓ እግዚአብሔር፡ ይመልክ፨
msItem.note: Book of Zechariah. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4 followed by numbers 1 to 10) are added in the margins. A few corrections are written interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ዘሚልክያስ፡ ነቢይ። ተረፈ፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ላዕለ፡ እስራኤል፡ በእደ፡ መልአኩ፡ ሐልይዎኬ፡ በልብክሙ፡ አፍቀርኩክሙ፡ ይቤ፡ እግዚአብሔር፨ ወትቤሉ፡ በበይነ፡ ምንት፡ አፍቀርከነ፡ አኮኑ፡ ዔሳውሃ፡ እኁሁ፡ ለያዕቆብ፡ ይቤ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ያዕቆብሃ፡ አፍቀርኩ፡ ወዔሳውሃ፡ ጸላእኩ፡
msItem.explicit: ዓባይ᎓ ወግር᎓ ምት᎓ እንተ᎓ ታስተርኢ፨
msItem.note: Book of Malachi. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ4 followed by numbers 1 to 4) are added in the margins.

msItem.explicit: ወከመ᎓ የሀብክሙ᎓ ዕሤተክሙ᎓ በጊዜሁ᎓ አሜን፨
msItem.note: Book of Sirach. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ, followed by numbers 1 to 4) are added in the margins. On fol. 239a, only half of the columns is filled with writing.
msItem.colophon: ተፈጸመ᎓ በዝየ᎓ ጥበቢሁ᎓ ለኢያሱ᎓ ወልደ᎓ ሲራክ።፨፨

bibl.citedRange: Pars posterior, quea continet apparatum criticum.

msItem.title: ዕዝራ፡
msItem.incipit: ዘዕዝራ፡ ወአመ፡ ሠላሳ፡ ዓመት፡ እምዘ፡ ወድቀት᎓ ሃገርነ᎓ ወሀለውኩ፡ ውስተ፡ ባቢሎን፡ አነ᎓ ሱቱኤል᎓ ዘተሰመይኩ᎓ ዕዝራ᎓
msItem.explicit: ወውእቱ᎓ ተሰመየ᎓ ጸሐፌ᎓ ጥበቢሁ᎓ ለልዑል᎓ እስከ᎓ ለዓለመ᎓ ዓለም᎓ አሜን፨
msItem.note: The First Book of Ezra. Chapters indications (abbeviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 14) are added in the margins. Numerous glosses and comments (some in Amharic) are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: ወአምጽኦ᎓ ኢየሱስ᎓ ፋሲካ᎓ ለአምላኩ᎓ ውስተ᎓ ኢየሩሳሌም᎓ ወጠብሐ᎓ ፋሲካ᎓ አመ᎓ ዓሡሩ᎓ ወረቡዑ᎓ ለቀዳሚ᎓ ወርኅ᎓ ወአቀሞሙ᎓
msItem.explicit: ተፈሥሑ᎓ ሶበ᎓ ሰምዑ᎓ ቃለ᎓ ዘመሀርዎሙ᎓ በኀበ᎓ ተጋብኡ፨
msItem.note: The Second Book of Ezra. Chapter indication (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 14) are added in the margins. Numerous glosses and comments (some of them in Amharic) are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: አመ᎓ ቀዳሚ᎓ ዓመት᎓ ለቂሮስ᎓ ንጉሠ᎓ ፋርስ᎓ እምዘ᎓ ሐልቀ᎓ ቃለ᎓
msItem.explicit: ወሠራዕክዎሙ᎓ ለካህናት᎓ ወሌዋውያን᎓ በእብሬቶሙ᎓ ወመባኦሙኒ᎓ ለእለ᎓ ይጸውሩ᎓ ዕፀ᎓ በበ᎓ ዕድሜ᎓ መዋዕሊሆሙ᎓ ተዘከረነ᎓ እግዚአ᎓ አምላክነ᎓ በሠናይ።
msItem.note: The Third Book of Ezra (the canonical books of Ezra and Nehemia). Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 21) are added in the margins. Numerous glosses and comments are written in the margins and interlineally. On f. 262v, between the columns a and b, there is a note indicating that a big portion of the text ("seven columns") has been omitted.

msItem.title: ጦብያ᎓
msItem.incipit: መጽሐፈ᎓ ነገሩ᎓ ለጦብያ᎓ ወለደ᎓ ጦቢት᎓ ወልደ᎓ ገብርኤል᎓ ዘእምነ᎓ አ ሰሔል᎓ ዘእምነገደ᎓ ንፍታሌም᎓
msItem.explicit: ወሰምዓ᎓ ዘእንበለ᎓ ይሙት᎓ ሙስናሃ᎓ ለነኔዌ᎓ ናቡክድናጾር᎓ ወአስዊሮስ። ወተፈሥሑ᎓ ዘእንበለ᎓ ይሙት᎓ ላዕለ᎓ ነነዌ።
msItem.note: Book of Tobit. Chapter indications composed of abbreviation ምዕ, followed by numbers 1 to 14), are added in the margins. Some glosses and comments are written in the margins and interlineally.

msItem.incipit: መንግሥቱ᎓ ለናቡከድናጾር᎓ ዘነግሠ᎓ ለፋርስ᎓ በነኔዌ᎓
msItem.explicit: ለሲማኮስ᎓ ጰጠሎማዊ᎓ ዘእምነ᎓ ኢየሩሳሌም፨፨፨፨
msItem.note: Book of Judith. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 16) are added in the margins. Some glosses and comments (most in Gǝʿǝz, some in Amharic) are written in the margins.

msItem.incipit: በካልእ᎓ ዓመት᎓ እምዘ᎓ ነግሠ᎓ እርጤከሲርክክሴስ᎓ ዐቢይ᎓ አመ᎓ ቀዳሚት᎓ መንግሥቱ᎓
msItem.explicit: ወዓዲ᎓ እምድኅረኒ᎓ ሞተት᎓ ብዙኃ᎓ መዋዕለ፨፨፨፨
msItem.note: Book of Esther. Chapter indications (abbreviation ምዕ followed by numbers 1 to 9) are added in the margins. Some glosses and comments (most in Gǝʿǝz, some in Amharic) are written in the margins.

foliation.note: Foliation of the Bibliothèque nationale de France in the upper right corner of the recto sides (no foliation in quire A and B).

signatures.note: Undecorated quire marks are written in the upper left corner of the first leaf of each quire (for quire 9, the quire mark is written on the stub of leaf 9).

list.item:
2
1, stub before 1 2, stub before 2 No foliation.

፱ 9
3, stub after 6 6, stub after 3 9, stub after 1

፲፬ 7
1, stub after 6 5, stub after 2 7, stub before 1

፲፯ 12
1 missing, stub after 10 4 missing, stub after 8 Stubs are broad, of irregular form.

፳፱ 8
2 missing, stub after 6 8 missing, stub before 1
list.note: The sequence of the quires seems to have been disturbed.

supportDesc.condition: Ownership notes reported by the catalogue to be on fols. , , are missing.

handNote.note: According to , is said to have started copying the text and stopped somewhere in .
According to , wrote an unspecified part of .
According to , wrote an unspecified part of .
Several hands that included chapter indications, glosses, comments and corrections.
Several hands that included chapter indications, glosses, comments and corrections.

item.q: ዝመጽሐፍ᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ በ መጒና᎓ ዮምሰ᎓ ዘእንጦንዮስ᎓ ዘአባዲያ᎓ዘአጥርዮ᎓
This book was in Magwinā. Now Antoine d'Abbadie has acquired it.
ዝመጽሐፍ᎓ ዘኮነ᎓ በመጒና᎓ ዮምሰ᎓ ዘእንጦንዮስ᎓ ዘአባዲያ᎓ ዘአጥርዮ᎓
እለ᎓ ነበሩ᎓ ምስክር᎓ አመ᎓ ወሀቡነ᎓ ፲ምድር᎓ እምድረ᎓ ቤተ᎓ ክርስቲያን᎓ ዘዳኪያ᎓
item.note: List of witnesses who were present when 10 plots of land that had belonged to the church of Dākiyā were assigned to another church (Magwinā). Written on the unruled leaf.
Two labels of the Biblithèque nationale on the front board (both poorly readable), on the spine, on the inner side of the front board (Ethiop. Abb. 35).

item.desc: Signature (note by the Library, in the bottom margin).
Catchwords in the upper left corner of the first leaf of each quire, below or above the quire mark.

binding.decoNote: Covered with blind-tooled leather (turn-ins, edges of the boards, spine tooled).
Textile inlays of deep brown colour.

origin.note: The manuscript was written by , , and very probably a few more scribes. It originally belonged to the monastery of Magwinā.

history.provenance: It was bought by Antoine d'Abbadie sometime between 1840 1848.
history.acquisition: The manuscript entered the Bibliothèque nationale in 1902.
